snippet.title: Boy, Snow, Bird
snippet.description: ''A play on Snow White, this bizarre fairy tale feels off-kilter and magical from its opening page. On a snowy night in 1953, downtrodden blond heroine Boy Novak escapes the clutches of her sadistic father and takes refuge in a Massachusetts town.''
